update client set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hobby = #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, constellation = #{constellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper_contact_id = #{upperContactId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from client c
c.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
and c.sex LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{sex}),'%')
and c.mobilephone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#mobilephone}),'%')
and c.telephone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#telephone}),'%')
and c.email LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{email}),'%')
and c.post LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{post}),'%')
and c.qq LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{qq}),'%')
and c.wechat LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{wechat}),'%')
and c.education LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{education}),'%')
and c.hobby LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{hobby}),'%')
and c.address LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{address}),'%')
and c.constellation LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{constellation}),'%')
and c.create_by LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{createBy}),'%')
and c.create_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and c.create_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and c.last_update_by LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{lastUpdateBy}),'%')
